Name: Definition of site safety training full compliance date.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the definition of site safety training full compliance date

History.Action: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.Description: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

History.Action: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
History.Description: This Introduction was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
This Introduction was Amended by Committee
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Housing and Buildings
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
History.AgendaNote: Preconsidered - Amended and Coupled on GO

History.Description: This Introduction was Sent to Mayor by Council
This Introduction was City Charter Rule Adopted
This Introduction was Returned Unsigned by Mayor

Summary: This bill would extend the full compliance date for Local Law 196 for the year 2017, which establishes construction worker site safety training requirements, to March 1, 2021.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. The definition of "SITE SAFETY TRAINING (SST) FULL COMPLIANCE DATE" in section 3302.1 of the New York city building code, as amended by local law number 119 for the year 2019, is amended to read as follows:
SITE SAFETY TRAINING (SST) FULL COMPLIANCE DATE. [September 1, 2020] March 1, 2021.

      ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect immediately, and shall be deemed to have been in force and effect on and after September 1, 2020.
      






APB
